column3: Universal standard for J-Series and modern 26" through-the-wall units.
Precision fit to eliminate gaps and reduce noise vibration.
Optimized for island wall thicknesses and proper unit drainage.
Solid-sided galvanized steel construction for long-term rigidity.
Baked enamel finish to resist rust and coastal salt-air corrosion.

column2: Specialized design that allows for rapid, secure assembly on-site without complex hardware, reducing installation labor for us.
A specialized weather seal that surrounds the opening to prevent drafts, moisture, and island humidity from entering the home.
Every unit comes standard with a rear grille to protect the external condenser fins from debris and maximize airflow efficiency.
Includes interior and exterior panels to keep the wall opening sealed and protected until the air conditioner chassis is ready for final deployment.
Directly supports high-demand Oahu models including AJCQ08AWJ, AJCQ10AWJ, AJCQ12AWJ, and LG HRSM series.
